animeDescription: The Haruba family is a wonderful family of three kids. The protagonist is the youngest son of the three siblings, who is in actuality, a spirit. The story unfolds in a nostalgic background of Japan and relates the life of this incredible family.  (Source: ANN)
animeVoices: ['Takeuchi, Junko', 'Takada, Yumi', 'Nagano, Ai', 'Kawashima, Chiyoko', 'Utsumi, Kenji', 'Sakaguchi, Daisuke', 'Nishihara, Kumiko', 'Yara, Yuusaku', 'Ichiryuusai, Teiyuu', 'Yamamoto, Yuriko']
